MILESTONE DATE: This Sales Step may optionally track when it was achieved. Enter a unique value from 1 - 10 to select the milestone number. Each tracked Sales Step of this Sales Campaign must have its own unique milestone number. A zero entry will not be tracked.

SALES BOARD: This Sales Step may optionally be displayed on the Sales Board. If displayed, specify the typical conversion rate for prospects that reach this step. This rate (decimal) will be multiplied by the prospect's potential value to calculate an estimated current value on the Sales Board.

AUTOMATED EMAIL STEP: This Sales Step may be an automatic step to be performed immediately (within the hour) by the system. Select the desired automatic step or leave blank for no automatic step. Select the email message from the second combo box for this automated email step. Sales Prospect email messages are created with the Email Manager.

AUTOMATED NEXT STEP: This Sales Step may be automatically set to the next Sales Step after the specify number of hours. (24 = 1 day, 168 = 7 days, 720 = 30 days). A zero entry will not be automatically changed. Specify the next Step # to go to after this step is performed. A zero entry will not go to a next step. (Predefined Steps: -3 = Fallback, -4 = Closed, -5 = Dead)
ATTACHED DOCUMENTS: Click the Document name to edit or click the "Add New Document" link on the right to attach a file to this Sales Step.
ATTACHED DOCUMENTS: Click the "Add New Document" link on the right to attach a file to this Sales Step.
